channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: EST Rapid Roundup: What Comes Next for U.S. Trade Policy After the Supreme Court’s IEEPA Ruling?
item.description: CSIS Economic Security and Technology Department experts examined the economic and geopolitical implications of the Supreme Court’s tariffs decision and assessed how it could reshape the administration’s strategy and trade toolkit going forward.

item.title: Revitalizing U.S.-Pacific Ties Through Kava Diplomacy
item.description: With U.S. aid declining in the Pacific Islands, kava trade plays a growing role in rebuilding regional economic ties.
